rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Wide entrance hall designed for traditional Kerala aesthetics with large wooden doors and stone accents, following Vastu guidelines to welcome positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural light, traditional Kerala motifs on ceilings and walls, ideal for social gatherings.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional and compact kitchen design with a dedicated prep area; built-in cabinetry respecting local aesthetics and Vastu alignment ensuring positive energy flow in the household.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample natural lighting from floor-to-ceiling windows; includes built-in wardrobe and a private balcony facing auspicious directions according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom designed for guests with comfortable space and windowed design following traditional Kerala style; positioned in line with local Vastu principles to promote harmony.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office area designed for efficient work environment with ergonomic layout and natural light; positioned away from busy areas in accordance with Vastu.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Cozy home theater setup integrated into the living space with retractable projection screen and soundproofing to maintain privacy and acoustic quality; designed as a bachelor pad entertainment zone.
